long_description: STABILicers anti-skid traction soles give your footwear a tenacious grip on snow and ice. Easy to wear-tough nylon straps use rip-and-stick fasteners to attach STABILicers to your favorite shoes or boots. Each durable rubber outsole features 17 replaceable case-hardened steel cleats that bite into ice and snow and even rock. Cleats are placed along perimeters of soles to maximize traction and stability through your natural stride. Chevron-patterned tread self-cleans by spitting out snow to deliver consistent traction. Cleats are not interchangeable between different styles of STABILicers.
short_description: STABILicers anti-skid traction soles give your footwear a tenacious grip on snow and ice.
